nodes.text: Amorphiia was a planet located in the Amorphiia system of the Mid Rim of the galaxy. It was the homeworld of the Amorphiians.

Discovered circa 3000 BBY by the Galactic Republic, Amorphiia played little to no part in the history of the space-crossing government. Joining the Galactic Empire and later the New Republic, the world avoided the Yuuzhan Vong War and the Second Galactic Civil War. As of 137 ABY it was a member world of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire.
